P

panelIsEmpty() - Method in class domino_project.PanelOfTiles
Checks if all rows of this Panel Of Tiles have no elements.
PanelOfTiles - Class in domino_project
This class represents a Panel(matrix) Of 28 different Tiles with values in [0,6] in which every Tile exists only once, using an ArrayList.It is an ArrayList Of SetOfTiles(4 rows,7 columns).Imagine as a 2d Matrix which contains the 28 tiles described above.
PanelOfTiles() - Constructor for class domino_project.PanelOfTiles
Class Constructor.
pickDominoTypeToPlay() - Static method in class domino_project.UserInterface
Shows main menu and returns the type of DominoGame user wants to play(as an integer).
pickTileToPlay(int, int) - Method in class domino_project.Bot
Returns the position of a Tile in its hand that can be played.
placeTileToLine(Tile, int) - Method in class domino_project.Board
This method puts the given tile to the line checking where it fits.
placeTileToLine(Tile, int, DominoLine) - Method in class domino_project.Board
This method does the same as the upper method but gets on more parameter to do the required type casting.
Player - Interface in domino_project
This interface represents a Player(Bot or Human) in a DominoGame.
playerIsPlaying(String) - Method in class domino_project.UserInterface
Shows which player is playing.
playerIsPlaying(String) - Method in class Gui.CardinalGui
Shows who is currently playing.
playerIsPlaying(String) - Method in class Gui.HungarianGui
Shows who is currently playing.
players - Variable in class domino_project.MultiplayerGame
ArrayList of Player consisting all the players of the MultiplayerGame.
putFromPanelToEndOFLine(int, boolean) - Method in class domino_project.BoardSolo1
* This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it at the End of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.
putFromPanelToStartOFLine(int, boolean) - Method in class domino_project.BoardSolo1
This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it on the Beggining of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.
